description:
SourceHydrator specifies a dry "don't repeat yourself" source for manifests, a sync source from which to sync
hydrated manifests, and an optional hydrateTo location to act as a "staging" aread for hydrated manifests.

drySource.description: DrySource specifies a location for dry "don't repeat yourself" manifest source information.

path.title: Path is a directory path within the Git repository where the manifests are located

repoURL.title: RepoURL is the URL to the git repository that contains the application manifests

targetRevision.title: TargetRevision defines the revision of the source to hydrate

hydrateTo.description:
HydrateTo specifies a location to which hydrated manifests should be pushed as a "staging area" before being moved to
the SyncSource. The RepoURL and Path are assumed based on the associated SyncSource config in the SourceHydrator.

targetBranch.title: TargetBranch is the branch to which hydrated manifests should be committed

syncSource.description:
SyncSource specifies a location from which hydrated manifests may be synced. RepoURL is assumed based on the
associated DrySource config in the SourceHydrator.

path.description:
Path is a directory path within the git repository where hydrated manifests should be committed to and synced
from. If hydrateTo is set, this is just the path from which hydrated manifests will be synced.

targetBranch.title: TargetBranch is the branch to which hydrated manifests should be committed
